title: What are some good computer brands to try making your own? - Quora

response.answer_text: Could you be more specific about your question ? Considering you would like to build a custom PC build and you are looking for good brands to consider for all the peripherals, I am listing some of the major peripheral brands you could opt below. CPU: Intel/AMD ( Intel best for gaming/Single core performance, AMD: Best for value).GPU: NVIDIA/AMD ( Right now NVIDIA has wide varities of product and performance lead, if you want to go for AMD, wait for Navi GPU lunch), Brands are: MSI, Gigabyte, ASUSPSU: Corsair/EVGARAM: Corsair LPX or Vengeance /Gskill Trident Z/ Kingston HyperxCPU Case: Corsair/Cooler Master/NZXT/Fractal Design/Thermal TakeCPU Cooler: Corsair/BE Quiet/ Cryorig/ Cooler MasterStorage: SSD ( Samsung, Intel, ADATA, WD), HDD (Seagate, Western Digital)Motherboard: Asus, MSI, GigaBytePlease be more specific next time.
